description.@en: Using the black, twisted tip of the horn, your victim is instantly mutated before your eyes and weakened by chaos incarnate.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, the person you touch must Resist with a successful Coordination Test or gain a Mutation called Taint of Chaos. In addition, they are left Helpless for one Turn.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but your foe cannot Resist this.

criticalFailure.@en: The touch of the horn does nothing, at least at first. Instead, you find your hand instantly atrophies. You are unable to use your primary hand for 48 hours.

reagents.@en: The horn of an Abyssal creature, used to touch a victim

system.distance: Any one person you can touch
